Chapter 6 Next steps 6.1 Going fancy with Shiny Dashboards library(shinyashboard) This is the skeleton code for creating Shiny dashboards. There are three components to a Shiny dashboard: Header Sidebar Body library(shiny) library(shinydashboard) ui <- dashboardPage( dashboardHeader(), dashboardSidebar(), dashboardBody() ) server <- function(input, output) { } shinyApp(ui, server)
